nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.persistence

Class FileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.persistence.FileReader

  • public class FileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    FileReader class is responsible for reading in a file to get a maze's parameters and then creating the maze.
